About Fallbrook Research

At Fallbrook we're leveraging data science, quantitative finance, operational analytics, & machine learning methods to model systematic investement strategies, find signals in the noise, and generate Alpha. Research for process workflow lifecycle including - alpha, beta, risk management, and execution & trade execution.

Achieving an Edge with:

  • Factor Analytics
  • Factor and Sector Rotation Trends
  • Beta Hedging
  • Systematic Trade Strategies
  • Optimizing Quantitative Research Processes

Re-engineering investment processes to increase alpha yields and more efficient risk management.
